ack.notes:
Acks an open incident.

Assumes that the username of the Cog user is the same as their
VictorOps username.

Requires API keys to be set:

    VICTOROPS_API_ID
    VICTOROPS_API_KEY

resolve.notes:
Resolved an open incident.

Assumes that the username of the Cog user is the same as their
VictorOps username.

Requires API keys to be set:

    VICTOROPS_API_ID
    VICTOROPS_API_KEY

phase.description: Comma-delimited list of phases to query for. Valid options are `resolved`, `acked`, `unacked`. Defaults to `acked`, `unacked`

incidents.examples:
Get all open incidents (triggered and acknowledged):

    victorops:incidents

Get only unacked incidents:

    victorops:incidents --phase unacked

Get acked and resolved incidents:

    victorops:incidents --phase acked,resolved
incidents.description: Get a list of open incidents
